summary: This bill, the NFIP Extension Act of 2025, aims to reauthorize the National Flood Insurance Program (NFIP). It amends the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to extend the program's financing and expiration date to September 30, 2025. The bill also includes a retroactive effective date, ensuring the changes take effect as if enacted on March 14, 2025, regardless of when it is actually passed.
